author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all. Needs companion cms-data PR: https://github.com/cms-data/DQM-Integration/pull/9

#### PR validation:

`scram b runtests_TestDQMOnlineClient-onlinebeammonitor_dqm_sourceclient` runs fine.

title: move unit test for `onlinebeammonitor_dqm_sourceclient-live` to use streamer files
